adjectives.description: inspiriting (comparative more inspiriting, superlative most inspiriting)

entries.meaning: Giving impetus or spirit; animating, encouraging.
examples: All honour to those who can abnegate for themselves the personal enjoyment of life, when by such renunciation they contribute worthily to increase the amount of happiness in the world; but he who does it, or professes to do it, for any other purpose, is no more deserving of admiration than the ascetic mounted on his pillar. He may be an inspiriting proof of what men can do, but assuredly not an example of what they should.
